summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Discord Bot Dashboard features: Server Data Sync API, Level Rewards API, Voice Stats API, Voice XP Configuration, Bot Appearance Settings, and ServerDataSelector component. All backend APIs working (100% success rate) and all frontend pages fully functional.

minor.issue: GuildConfigUpdate model was missing voice_xp and bot_appearance fields - FIXED during testing

passed_tests: API: GET /api/guilds/{guildId}/server-data - 200 OK (returns roles, channels, categories, emojis)
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId} - Voice XP settings (voice_xp_enabled, voice_xp_per_minute, voice_xp_min_users)
API: PUT /api/guilds/{guildId} - Bot Appearance settings (bot_status, bot_activity_type, bot_activity_text, bot_embed_color)
Leveling Page: Voice XP section with toggle and settings
Leveling Page: Level-Belohnungen section with Hinzufügen button
Leveling Page: Add Level Reward dialog with Level input, Belohnungs-Typ dropdown, Role/Emoji selector
Leveling Page: Stats cards (XP/Nachricht, XP/Minute Voice, Level-Belohnungen, In Voice)
Settings Page: Bot Aussehen section with Bot Status, Aktivitäts-Typ, Aktivitäts-Text, Embed Farbe
Settings Page: Color picker for Embed Farbe
ServerDataSelector: Shows 'Keine Textkanal/Sprachkanal gefunden' when no data (expected - bot not running)
critical_code_review_comments: GuildConfigUpdate model in server.py was missing voice_xp_enabled, voice_xp_per_minute, voice_xp_min_users, voice_afk_channel, bot_status, bot_activity_type, bot_activity_text, bot_embed_color, games_enabled, games_channel fields - FIXED during testing
ServerDataSelector component correctly handles empty server data with appropriate messages
All new API endpoints properly return structured responses with correct field types
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_ prefixed level rewards during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new feature APIs are working: /api/guilds/{guildId}/server-data, /api/guilds/{guildId}/level-rewards (GET, POST, DELETE, toggle), /api/guilds/{guildId}/voice-stats, /api/guilds/{guildId}/voice-sessions. Voice XP and Bot Appearance settings can be saved via PUT /api/guilds/{guildId}. ServerDataSelector component shows 'Daten werden geladen...' or 'Keine X gefunden' when server data is empty - this is expected behavior until the Discord bot runs and syncs data. Test credentials: admin@test.de / admin123, Guild ID: 807292920734547969.
